thread.title: British Journal of Sports Medicine

title: British Journal of Sports Medicine

organizations.name: british journal of sports medicine email

text:
Email alerts 
British Journal of Sports Medicine (BJSM) is a multimedia portal for authoritative original research, systematic reviews, consensus statements and timely debate in sport and exercise medicine (SEM) as well as clinical education and implementation success stories. BJSMâ€™s web, print, video and audio material serves the international sport and exercise medicine community with the journal recognised as a leader in sports medicine social media: @BJSM_BMJ, podcasts, a blog and now its own app available via iTunes and Google Play. BJSM serves >20 sports medicine and sports physiotherapy societies who have over 12,000 members. 
This home page is under development
